segments.text: Jenny , what's wrong with you ? Why do you keep weeping like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mary told me that she had seen you with John last night . I got to know the fact that you are playing the field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , cross my heart , I'v never looked at another woman since the first day I set my eyes on you ! Believe me , that's the truth .
segments.speaker: S1
